OUTLINE : This multicenter study . All patient complete screen questionnaire ( GFI , G8 , standardize CGA consist ADL ( Katz index ) IADL ; Timed Up Go ; Cancer Leukemia Group B adaptation Charlson Co-morbidity ; Mini Nutritional Assessment ; RAND Social Support Survey Instrument ; Folstein Mini Mental State Examination ; Geriatric Depression Scale ) start anticancer treatment , prior course treatment , 1 month treatment . Patients also undergo physical cognitive performance measure trained member research team . Patients assign group base fitness treatment . They may reassign round assessment . - Group 1 ( fit undergo standard treatment ) : Patients undergo standard treatment . - Group 2 ( vulnerable ) : Patients receive specialize care individualize treatment . - Group 3 ( frail ) : Patients receive palliative care anticancer chemotherapy target agent .
